downSample¶

public TimeSeries downSample(Frequency frequency, SampleMethod sampleMethod)¶

Create a copy of the time series with a new frequency, summing all points into their proper buckets

Parameters:
  • frequency – The frequency to take samples (i.e every 5 minutes, 10 seconds, etc.)
  • sampleMethod – The mechanism to use when taking samples (sum, mean, etc.)
Returns:

A new TimeSeries with the specified frequency

downSampleToTimeWindow¶

public TimeSeries downSampleToTimeWindow(DateTime start, DateTime end, Frequency frequency, SampleMethod sampleMethod)¶

Downsample the data while fitting to a specific time window. Non-existant data will be filled in as zero TODO: Make this use NaN instead of zero for empty areas

Parameters:
  • start – The start of the time window desired
  • end – The end of the time window desired, inclusive
  • frequency – How often to take samples
  • sampleMethod – How to interpolate the data
Returns:

A new TimeSeries object with the downsampled data

mean¶

public BigDecimal mean()¶

Compute the mean of all elements in the time-series

Returns:The mean of all elements

sum¶

public BigDecimal sum()¶

Sum all the elements in the time-series (i.e downsample with sum across entire time slice)

Returns:The sum of all elements
